Game.Name: Mahjong Gokuu Special (Japan)
Game.plot: Mahjong game based around the Monkey King legend.http://www.pcengine.co.uk/HTML_Games/Mahjong_Goku_Special.htmCheat: Cheat ModeAt the title screen, enter the 2nd option for the password screen. Now, modify the mahjong pieces to the following numbers: 6, 4, 1, 9, 4, 7, 2. For the final piece, select the 3rd Chinese character. Then, press I and the words "Enter Password" will turn orange. Press II to go back to the title screen and choose the 1st option. Press I three times and you'll be right back at the title screen again. Now, depending on what buttons you press, you can enable several cheats.
Game.Notes: Mahjong Gokuu Special is a four-player mahjong game that features characters from the Chinese novel Journey to the West. The player controls Goku, a.k.a. Sun Wukong the Monkey King, and must combat the various demons his party come across by playing them at mahjong.
